mainText: Today overall sales cross the previous day. This is great news for the company. Trend increase day by day.
Losectil sales are very high from other days in this month.

Today’s sales are 100 Tk. It is the better than last day sales. Today's achievements is 89%. Among 9 NSM Forhad and Md Nazrul are not able to achieve their daily target. The main reason is Forhad makes 5% returns and Md Nazrul achieve only 45% sales target.
